messages.title: Postal Vote Information
messages.content: Please use your postal vote to support Alan Mak and Clare Satchwell. Your postal vote will shortly land on your doormat.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lowered taxes for hardworking people and local businesses. Cut Labour's deficit by 50% so our children aren't burdened with debt. Created 1000 new jobs every day, and launched 2 million new apprenticeships.
Help us finish re-building our economy so we don't let Ed Miliband and Ed Balls into Downing Street.

issues.economy: Lowered taxes for hardworking people and local businesses. Cut Labour's deficit by 50% so our children aren't burdened with debt. Created 1000 new jobs every day, and launched 2 million new apprenticeships.
issues.governance: Help us finish re-building our economy so we don't let Ed Miliband and Ed Balls into Downing Street.

housing.content: Protect green spaces and campaign for more business investment into the Havant Borough.

contactInformation.address: Havant Conservatives, 19 South Street, Havant, PO9 1BU

images.caption: Campaign leaflet for Alan Mak, Conservative MP Candidate for Havant, and Clare Satchwell, Conservative Council Candidate for Hayling East.
